column1: Roheryn was the Horses of Aragorn
column2: brought to him out of the north by the Rangers of the North during the War of the Ring
column3: and said to have been a gift from the lady Arwen.

column1: Roheryn is a Gondor Sindarin name
column2: softened from the pure Sindarin Rocheryn
column4: p. 97-8 The first element in Ro(c)heryn is Horses#Names ("horse")
